texts.text: Patch 27 was a version of Wii U Edition released on August 29, 2017.[1] [edit]

1 Additions
2 Changes
3 Fixes
4 See also
5 References

Added Glide Myths Track Pack; Drift through the clouds of Icarus, dive into conflict in Excalibur and ride with the Kelpies in Celts.
Added "Strangers - Biome Settlers 3" Skin Pack.

Endermen and endermites are now always hostile to each other.
Polar bears no longer attack the player when in peaceful mode.
Wither skeletons no longer fear daylight and will attack anything that lives.
Zombie horses and skeleton horses can now be tamed and leashed.
Skeletons no longer attack iron golems.
Strays now flee from wolves.
Wolves no longer become hostile against mobs that they cannot directly see.
Crafting any kind of boat now requires a wooden shovel.
String can now be crafted from Web.
Purpur stairs and slabs can now be crafted from both purpur blocks and pillars.
Stone slabs, redstone repeaters, and redstone comparators can now be crafted from stone, granite, andesite, diorite and their polished variants.
Observers now register changes to item frames, doors, and flower pots.
Observers no longer output extra signals for fire block state changes or multiple signals when lava or water is place in front of them.
Pistons can now push daylight sensors.
Potion durations have changed.
Enabled transferring of saves to Nintendo Switch Edition.

MCCE-2000 – Zombies get stuck in water
MCCE-2162 – Items disappearing in inventory; possible autosave issue
MCCE-2483 – Creating new world with specific seed locks up console
MCCE-2600 – Enchantment shimmer is 1×1 pixel offseted
MCCE-2667 – Zombie village bug
MCCE-2838 – Name tags in Tutorial world
MCCE-2868 – Levitation effect all in caps
MCCE-2872 – Mobs despawning when going through nether portals
MCCE-3781 – Potion effect runs out while paused
MCCE-3876 – Ender pearl cooldown missing
MCCE-3964 – Renamed items in the item frames
MCCE-4023 – Losing air bubbles while paused
MCCE-4370 – Regenerating carrot stick when opening interface of something
MCCE-4430 – Fishing rods
MCCE-4595 – Horse rotation and player rotation while on horse not in sync
MCCE-4776 – Half-blocks will not kill the player on Glide
MCCE-4826 – Game crashing
MCCE-5069 – Cannot rename stacks of items.
MCCE-5104 – Slime blocks are broken
MCCE-5108 – Evocation fangs bug
MCCE-5119 – No new trophies on Xbox One
MCCE-5190 – Elytra "Wind" sound effect continues to play when game is paused while flying
MCCE-5229 – Observers give out random power signals when observing water or lava
MCCE-5259 – Pistons facing sideways do not update each other
MCCE-5265 – Pistons not retracting
MCCE-5326 – Issue with '<' and '>' symbols on named items
MCCE-5395 – Minecart sounds activates for no reason
MCCE-5413 – "Music to my Ears" achievement not unlocking.
MCCE-5468 – Dyed beds are just called "Bed" in PS Vita
MCCE-5500 – Pistons are broken
MCCE-5512 – When "feeding" Llamas for purposes of causing them to enter Love Mode, the view changes as though attempting to ride them.
MCCE-5523 – Pick block in Creative not working
MCCE-5539 – Unable to earn "Free Diver" achievement
MCCE-5549 – Hotbar is not centered in splitscreen Battle
MCCE-5571 – Baby cats sitting, teleport to player when grown
MCCE-5682 – The bud of the piston has been corrected half vertically but not at all horizontal.
MCCE-5864 – Cannot access paid-for texture and skin packs on PS3.
MCCE-5882 – Glide map not loading
Fixed slow moving mobs in water.
Fix for Farmer Villagers not planting seeds often enough.
Fixed area in the Mini Game Lobby that caused players to become invulnerable in the Mini Game if they were in this location when the round started.

Xbox 360 Edition TU57
Xbox One Edition CU49
PlayStation 3 Edition 1.57
PlayStation 4 Edition 1.56
PlayStation Vita Edition 1.56
Nintendo Switch Edition 1.0.7
"Minecraft: Wii U Edition Patch change logs" – Minecraft Forum, August 29, 2017.
